com.rift.coad.daemon.event
Interface FeedServer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface FeedServer
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface defines the methods that manage the feed events.

Method Summary
 java.util.List<FeedEvent> getEvents(java.lang.String feedIdentifier)
          This method returns the list of feed events for a given tab.
 java.util.List<EventInfo> getMimeEvents()
          This method returns the mime based events.
 java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFeedIdentifiers(java.lang.String desktop)
          This method lists of feed identifiers.
